document_data.name: Choldrith
document_data.mainbody: '''Choldriths''' were the [[cleric|priest]] race of the [[chitine]]s in the [[Underdark]].
document_data.Description: Choldriths had eight slender legs (although the front two served as arms) and resembled bloated white [[spider]]s about {{SI|9|feet|long=yes}} in diameter. Their faces resembled those of chitines, with some [[humanoid]] features, faceted eyes, and mandibles protruding from their mouths. Their ears looked like horns.
document_data.Combat:
When possible, choldriths used their chitine subordinates as fodder to shield them in battle while they used their clerical [[spell]]s.

They could spin webs like a spider, and could throw out net-like webs to ensnare foes up to {{SI|50|feet|long=yes}} away. Also like a spider, their bite was highly venomous.
document_data.Society:
Choldriths were priests and spellcasters. They lived alongside chitines in villages inside caverns filled with maze-like webs. In the center of the cavern was always a temple to [[Lolth]]. Choldriths served as the leaders of each village, as they were seen as blessed by Lolth.

Choldriths were found alongside chitines in the [[Upperdark|upper]] and [[Middledark|middle]]-[[Northdark]].
document_data.History: Choldriths were said to have been created by Lolth herself. It was believed that transformation into a choldrith was a kind of twisted reward bestowed by the Spider Queen on those who passed her tests, not unlike how transformation into a [[drider]] was a punishment for failing her tests.
